nodes.bodyText: Need to adjust this comment to match the code below it.
Strictly speaking this is not reliable as other observers can add the @Interceptor annotation programmatically later.
I've left that but added a second check in the ProcessManagedBean observer, just in case.
Oh, interesting; I guess Jandex takes meta-annotations into account?

But that is not related to the functional change at the heart of this PR so it's probably best to not make that change...at least now.
